name: Basic
description: Affordable access to gym with basic equipment and fitness classes.
features: Access to gym during regular hours
Access to basic fitness classes (e.g., yoga, pilates)

name: Standard
description: 24/7 access with premium equipment and personal training.
features: Access to specialized fitness classes (e.g., HIIT, CrossFit)
Free body composition analysis every 3 months

name: Premium
description: Unlimited access, personal training, and exclusive fitness classes.
features: Use of all gym equipment including premium machines
Locker room, sauna, and steam room access
Access to exclusive high-end fitness classes (e.g., Spin, Boxing)
Nutrition consultation and personalized meal plans
Free massage therapy session once per month
